target.name: rebuild
target.x-compile: --debug exclude -all and include -f=Boot.js and concatenate buildext/ext.panel.development.js and exclude -all and # include theme overrides include -r -tag=overrides and # include all js files needed for manifestext-panel.js include -r -f=manifestext-panel.js and # exclude the generated manifest file itself, # since we don't want the generated bundle file to create any components exclude -f=manifestext-panel.js and concatenate +append buildext/ext.panel.development.js and scss -appName=App -imageSearchPath=resources -themeName=material -resourceMapBase=. -output=buildext/ext.scss and resources -excludes=-all*.css -out=buildext/resources and resources -model=true -out=buildext/resources

target.name: build
target.x-sencha-command:
fashion -pwd=. -split=4095 -compress buildext/ext.scss buildext/ext.css
then
fs minify -yui -from=buildext/ext.panel.development.js -to=buildext/ext.panel.production.js
